text: ( Source : Drake University ) A LOOK AT VOTING MYTHS & FACTS ABOUT THE 'HASHTAG GENERATION' HOSTED BY NPR 'S MICHEL MARTIN Running for office traditionally meant hunting for votes at fish fries and county fairs. These days, candidates are
